item.title: Azure App Service routing using Application Gateway
item.description: Use Azure Application Gateway to give multiple App Services the same domain and route between them using path based rules

item.title: IIS configuration for Single Page Apps
item.description: A guide for setting up Internet Information Services (IIS) to serve a Single Page Application (SPA)

item.title: Integrating external cameras in Vuforia UWP apps
item.description: A story about handling unsupported cameras in Vuforia using the external camera feature and UWP desktop bridge technology
